data.name: THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV - DLC Costume "CLASSIC LEONA"
data.detailed_description:
- Leona Heidern Costume for THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV
Leona Heidern's costume can be changed to the costume she wore in "KOF '96".
data.about_the_game:
- Leona Heidern Costume for THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV
Leona Heidern's costume can be changed to the costume she wore in "KOF '96".
data.short_description: - Leona Heidern Costume for THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
